oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comprehensive simulation of program, erase and retention in charge tapping flash memories
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PAUL, A
CHSRIDHAR
GEDAM, S
MAHAPATRA, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: flash memories
logic simulation
optimisation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simulator is developed for SONOS flash memories to predict program (P), erase (E) and retention (R) behavior under uniform ID operation. It provides insight on the impact of trap parameters on P, E and R and can be used to optimize memory stacks.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the International Electron Devices Meeting, San Francisco, USA, 11-13 December 2006, 1-4
